content: oh hey guys welcome to short tip DM scotty here yeah i had a just a short
thing I want to show you I had some runes in a recent dungeon I did where I
wanted to have a few decayed corpses in the room I also had another room where I
had a albear that was in the room and I wanted to that these overs attempt
locked up in was pretty crazed and there were a lot of remains around so I wanted
to have some remains in the room also so I wanted to have a way to add quickly
add remains to a room so I came up with a really cheap technique for doing that
and I'll show you those and tell you how you did it right now so here's the
decomposed corpse markers I made so basically all I have here is I have
three major night old mage night figures and I just chopped them up and put them
on these this is just a card stock base so it's a card stock base I just put
some hot glue on there and just glue the figures to the base I painted the base
with the rock texture first then I put some hot glue on it and stuck the
miniatures on to the base and then I gave it a wash with a dark brown to make
it look old and decomposing so you can see there the detail and here's another
one just when I left the guys shield on I just cut the limbs off and then this
one this made this major Knight figure is actually a had a pole arm and I cut
the pole arm off and just laid him down so so some really nice quick effects
there for cheap and easy skeletal remains you want to add to a location
and I want to show you I want to show you one other thing I did here I have
the remains of a horse and I thought it looked pretty nice this was actually
like a skeletal mages Kellett alrea model and there was a like a banshee on
top of the horse I just ripped that off and I glued the just made it similar to
the other corpses I just have a card stock base and then I paying the base
with the stone texture put some hot glue on there chop the horse up a bit
then washed it with a dark brown to give it that decayed look old look and there
we go some easy and quick corpses for your rooms and your dungeon and I'll see
you next time on short tip
